thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Joseph

author: Joseph
title: Joseph
text: Thrift books is a great way to save money on books, and all 4 that I have ordered have been in excellent condition. If you need a book quickly however, you better do straight to the bookstore or order from Amazon, as it takes a minimum of a week (usually 7 to 10 days) to receive you order. However, if not in a hurry, I encourage you to buy from Thrift Books as the prices as about 80% less than Amazon and shipping is very inexpensive. If you order $10 worth, shipping is free!
